typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	containerName as string,
	entityName as string,
	dataFormat as string,
	perCompanyEntity as boolean
}
source(output(
		{timestamp-0} as long,
		{systemId-2000000000} as string,
		{SystemCreatedAt-2000000001} as timestamp,
		{$Company} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	entity: ($entityName),
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'deltas',
	local: true,
	folderPath: '',
	fileSystem: ($containerName),
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSS\'Z\'']) ~> Deltas
source(output(
		{timestamp-0} as long,
		{systemId-2000000000} as string,
		{SystemCreatedAt-2000000001} as timestamp,
		{$Company} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	entity: ($entityName),
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'data',
	local: true,
	folderPath: '',
	fileSystem: ($containerName),
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss','yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSS\'Z\'']) ~> CurrentData
DeltasWithUniqueRecordKey filter(isNull({SystemCreatedAt-2000000001})) ~> FilterForDeleted
CombineWithDeltas, FilterForDeleted exists(CombineWithDeltas@{$UniqueRecordKey} == DeltasWithUniqueRecordKey@{$UniqueRecordKey},
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RemoveDeleted
FilterEmptyRows sort(desc({timestamp-0}, false)) ~> SortByTimestamp
SortByTimestamp aggregate(groupBy({$UniqueRecordKey}),
	each(match(iif(name=='$UniqueRecordKey',false(),iif(name=='$Company',$perCompanyEntity==true(),true()))), $$ = first($$))) ~> PickLastChanges
DeltasWithUniqueRecordKey, CurrentDataWithUniqueRecordKey union(byName: true)~> CombineWithDeltas
RemoveDeleted filter(not(isNull({systemId-2000000000}))) ~> FilterEmptyRows
SelectAllExceptUniqueRecordKeyColumn split(equals($dataFormat, 'parquet'),
	equals($dataFormat, 'CSV'),
	disjoint: false) ~> DataFormatCondition@(ParquetStaging, CSVStaging)
CurrentData derive({$UniqueRecordKey} = concat({systemId-2000000000}, iif($perCompanyEntity, {$Company}, ""))) ~> CurrentDataWithUniqueRecordKey
Deltas derive({$UniqueRecordKey} = concat({systemId-2000000000}, iif($perCompanyEntity, {$Company}, ""))) ~> DeltasWithUniqueRecordKey
PickLastChanges select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name!='$UniqueRecordKey'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAllExceptUniqueRecordKeyColumn
DataFormatCondition@ParquetStaging sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	fileSystem: ($containerName),
	folderPath: (concat('staging/', $entityName)),
	compressionCodec: 'snappy',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		each(match(true()))
	),
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> StagingParquet
DataFormatCondition@CSVStaging sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: ($containerName),
	folderPath: (concat('staging/', $entityName)),
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		each(match(true()))
	),
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> StagingCSV
